subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Competing in his first race since escaping a doping ban, Alberto Contador kept alive his chances for a third straight Tour of the Algarve title by remaining in second place over all after the race’s next-to-last stage in Tavira, Portugal.
snippet: Competing in his first race since escaping a doping ban, Alberto Contador kept alive his chances for a third straight Tour of the Algarve title by remaining in second place over all after the race’s next-to-last stage in Tavira, Portugal.
